features: Ultralight nylon ripstop face fabric has a water-resistant endurance coating for improved weather protection

Revolutionary lightweight 100% recycled polyester PlumaFill insulation replicates the structure of down in a continuous synthetic insulation material, offering the warmth and packability of down but with the warm-when-wet performance of synthetic insulation
Warmth is maximized by pairing a weather-resistant hung face fabric with internal, innovative quilting construction to stabilize and maximize the loft of the PlumaFill strands with minimal stitching
Alpine helmet-compatible, insulated hood features single-pull cord adjustment in back and stretchy binding at front
Two-way center-front Vislon® zipper backed with an internal wind flap allows for belay loop access
External left-chest pocket and two handwarmer pockets all outfitted with zipper garages; self-stuffs into left-front pocket
Low-profile, lightly elasticized cuffs and hem seal in warmth; Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
